overview_of_class: This is the first quarter of the Beginning German sequence: a systematic introduction to basic German. All four language skills - speaking, listening comprehension, reading and writing- are stressed to insure that students acquire a basic command of German. Classes are conducted in German, except when explanations of grammar or other material require the use of English. Key features of this quarter: 1) short individual interviews at the end of the quarter and 2) cultural focus on Germany.
name: Beginning German
subject: GERMAN
